name: SUBSTRING
description: Extracts a substring from a string starting at a specified position.

examples.title: Extract first 3 characters
examples.sql: SELECT SUBSTRING(name, 1, 3) as initials FROM users

examples.title: Extract from position
examples.sql: SELECT SUBSTRING(code FROM 6) as suffix FROM products

examples.title: Extract username from email
examples.sql: SELECT SUBSTRING(email, 1, POSITION('@' IN email) - 1) as username FROM users

notes: If length exceeds remaining characters, returns available characters
